title: Not enough iP/RP

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Cannot buy any 425 IP champ while i have 800+ IP on my account ?!
This only happen since patch 6.15
Check the picture for proof

replies.body:
This definitely looked strange, so I took a look at your account and confirmed *CrazFight's* suspicions. Your IP balance is below 810 IP and the client just hadn't updated the visual display of your proper balance. This rarely happens, and it should have resolved itself by now. 

If you're still seeing this issue, please let me know.

Just having it right now. 1355 IP but it still shows 'not enough' on 1350 IP champs. I also can't buy them using IP. I'll reboot my client and it will probably be fixed.
https://www.upload.ee/image/6013291/LeagueBug.png
EDIT: It's fixed by restarting the client. Purchasing hextech crates with my RP desynced my RP as well.

Typically, reloading your client will fix Shop and incorrect display of IP/RP errors, so try that if you haven't already.

Did you know about the free champions that Riot offers? You can get three free skins *and* their champion off Riot's [Promotional Content article here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-). It includes;

* Riot Girl Tristana
* Dreadknight Garen
* Unchained Alistar

**Unchained Alistar** was a Youtube promotion but the redemption process was broken and it was recently removed, but you can still obtain it free by submitting a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) requesting it be added to your account. Just have 'Unchained Alistar' in the title and Blitzcrank Bot should be able to add it to your account automatically.

What is ur job here? 


hehe xd
You have a visual bug, you don't actually have 810 IP, in time it will re adjust itself.
